completed_features.description: Created @cim-expert and @domain-expert agents for CIM guidance
Created CLAUDE.md, domain creation guides, and mathematical foundations docs
Added Mermaid diagrams showing DEV channel, JetStream architecture, and event flows
Updated schemas to be compatible with cim-graph library event format
Created custom commands (/cim, /domain, /architecture) for easy expert access
Added .claude/init.md for claude init customization when using as template
Corrected cim-events to cim-domain, cim-domain-workflow to cim-graph throughout project
Created automated JetStream container/VM provisioning for DEV channel
Clarified CIM-Start as DEV channel providing more events than git commits
Created @network-expert agent to invoke cim-network MCP for topology after NATS launch
Added MCP server management to flake.nix with conditional enabling and process detection for 4 MCP servers

current_focus.description: Adding network topology layer using cim-network MCP after NATS launch
priority_tasks: Launch JetStream container for development events
Invoke cim-network MCP through network expert agent
Test network topology and domain expert integration

next_milestones.description: Enable real-time domain building through JetStream events
Complete workflow from domain creation to JetStream event capture
DEV channel events ready for replication to production CIM

architecture_decisions.rationale: Provides fine-grained event capture beyond git commit granularity
Uses established library for event-driven graph construction

architecture_decisions.decision: Claude Code Agents for Domain Expertise
architecture_decisions.rationale: Provides interactive guidance for complex domain creation process
Users create projects from CIM-Start template, customize with claude init

technical_debt.item: Integration testing between agents and JetStream
technical_debt.description: Need to verify domain expert agent can successfully publish to JetStream
